alert.note: Alert for Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:52PM EDT until April 15 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 752 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles south of Donalsonville to 10 miles south of Greensboro to 16 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, St. Marks, Tallahassee Community College, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Whigham, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, Rocky Hill and South City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
